column2: Charlie Eppes, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was just prescribed this medication last night.  What you all (the reviewers) have to realize, is that medications don't work the same for everyone, so everyone will have a different experience with it.  Now, while I have just started taking it last night for Pneumonia, I have noticed that it has eased my coughing and I am bringing up more phlegm.  I also get tired, but not really enough for a good night's sleep.  I did get a good nap in today though.  I agree about the taste though.  It tastes AWFUL!  I mix it with strawberry or chocolate milk.  That seems to work for me.  I still taste the medicine, but it's not so bad.  I am itching in the genital area though, so I have started Monistat, but that is to be expected.  We should all EXPECT to have SOME kind of SIDE EFFECT.  It's normal.  So while it may not work for some of you, it doesn't mean that it won't work for no one!

column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: Actually, my dear hard headed wife is taking it. I am not at all impressed with her Pulmonologist. I went with her to the first and second appointments and told him that she coughs most of the night and seems to sleep through most of it. I can not sleep at all when she is coughing, and would like for her to have a stronger medication at least for a few nights. BTW I am a pharmacist. When I told him that I could not sleep for her coughing, his snide remark was, "Well go sleep in another room!" That does not get to the cause of this unusual, unnecessary cough. She has had scans and the gament. He said that he MEANT that she was to use NOTHING with a scent. He gave her a long list including Clorox, deodorant, cremes, lotions, soaps, even cooking foods. I am destitute, mainly becaujse I am afraid that there is an under lying cause that will continue to do more harm. Her DEAR ENT wants her to see another specialist, Get this, "She does not want to hurt the drs feelings!" I LOVE her dearly and cannot imagine my life without her, especially after 38 years, three precious children, and two preciouis grandchildren. Her DEAR ENT did give her a new RX for Rutuss, but she is afraid to take more than a few doses of such a strong med. I TRY to tell her that just a few nights would get that ole cough center quieted down and she may not need any more. It is 12:30 AM now. She is in the bed asleep coughing, I am here almost in tears considering what may be the real problem. PLEASE pray for her and me.

column2: Cough cough, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)

column2: MB, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had a dry tickle that set off a mostly unproductive coughing fit after (I thought) I was done with a cold and an intermittent sore throat. I couldn't lay flat on my back or I'd hear a gurgle in my chest. The only position that gave me any relief was sitting up and leaning forward. I got some sleep by dragging a folding chair over to an ironing board with a pillow on it and putting my head down.I was prescribed Levaquin (antibiotic), Cheratussin AC syrup (codeine and Guaifenesin), Proair inhailer and told to get a chest x-ray. I assume it isn't pneumonia since I didn't get a call back after 3 days.Of all of the presciptions, the Cheratussin was the workhorse on the symptoms. When they say take it with liquids they aren't kidding. It will seem that the cough is worse but it makes it VERY productive in a matter of minutes so have the kleenex handy. The more crap you get rid of the better. If it makes you feel queazy I found that having some saltine crackers helped dramatically.

column9: I have not had good luck with this drug.  My cough is terrible and even with the drug I am coughing violently.  Last night, after extensive research about drug interactions, I took 30 ml of Nyquil Cold/Flu and 1 tablet (1/2 dose) of Sudafed.  I slept soundly until 9:22 this morning.

column9: I took 3 teaspoonsful of this medication @ 9:30pm-10:00pm and about 12:00am I started to feel something but by then I was coughing and hacking so voliently it was just an addition to my dizziness I got from coughing. Very dissappointed in this product and I have nothing else to relieve this. Delsyum is suppose to be the best stuff OTC wise and it SUCKS AND IT TASTS HORRIBLE! I mine as well drink licker instead of these products! Very dissappointned!
